overview:
Kalvin Kim is the CTO of Phonevite. Previously, Kalvin was a Director of Engineering at Dialpad Communications (acquired by Yahoo). At Dialpad, he was responsible for engineering the core server systems and client applications. The systems that Kalvin developed are now an integral part of Yahooâ€™s communications products, such as the Yahoo Messenger and Yahoo Voice. Prior to Dialpad, Kalvin worked as a Software Engineer at Serome Technology, a leading South Korean software company, where he developed ground-breaking VoIP applications.

via: Phonevite
